alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Greene (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:54PM CDT until May 07 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WESTERN GREENE AND NORTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ralston, or 10 miles east of Carroll, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Glidden, Scranton, Lidderdale and Ralston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
